sections.heading: division; powers and duties.The division shall:(1) Establish by rules and regulations a process for resolving complaints from both vendors and state agencies;(2) Maintain a record and written justification of purchases as follows:(a) A list of and explanation for emergency purchases;(b) A list of op
sections.text: division; powers and duties.The division shall:(1) Establish by rules and regulations a process for resolving complaints from both vendors and state agencies;(2) Maintain a record and written justification of purchases as follows:(a) A list of and explanation for emergency purchases;(b) A list of open market purchases made by the division; and(c) A list of all purchases waived from the minimum time period requirement between bid advertisement and bid opening; and(3) Have the authority to enter into joint purchasing agreements with political subdivisions in the state.SourceLaws 1981, LB 381, ยง 30;R.S.1943, (2014), ยง 81-1118.05;Laws 2024, LB461, ยง 4.
